about_the_game:
Get ready to slither across floors and walls in Cube Snake, a fresh take on the beloved Arcade and Brick-Phone Classic and nom nom nom your way to the top of your personal or global leaderboards!

Get ready to explore a 3D cubic environment, collect fruit pouches, and avoid falling off the walls in an addictive and endless game, perfect for amplifying your procrastination!

In Cube Snake you use two buttons to turn left and right and to help you crawl on the floor and walls. You must pay attention to where your food spawns, eat it, and grow your snake as long as you can make it, but why are we telling you this, we’re sure you already know!

Key Features:

  • Crawl: Use two buttons to turn left and right and crawl on the floor and walls. It’s isometric!

  • Eat: Pay attention to where your food randomly spawns, and go munch it up!

  • Grow: Every time you eat, your tail grows longer, so get lengthy!

  • Survive: Be careful to not cross the red line and… not to eat your own tail!

  • Score: The higher the better, but if it's short it's ok too, aim to beat your own score or fight for the top global rankings!

Built on the latest generation graphics engine to prove that it has actually been almost 50 years since the original Snake, and because we want to appease those with a keen eye for beautiful graphics. Ah, and the chiptune music is completely original, made by us using a gameboy!

Join us On Discord

name: Cube Snake

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: AMD Rayzen or Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • Storage: 516 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Rayzen or Intel i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060
  • Storage: 516 MB available space

short_description: Slither through a retro-futuristic cyberpunk world in this 3D Cubic take of the classic 1976 & 1998 Snake games!
